Bioinformatics/Genomics research and education at the University of Bradford, managed by Dr Poterlowicz's group. Currently our Team investigate questions related to Genomics and Epigenomics of hair and skin development and disorders. 

Recently We have developed an integrated software and pipelines for the epigenetic variants analysis in which both availability and reproducibility requirements are explicitly satisfied. This was delivered in a web based platform Galaxy freely available to the researchers community find out more in our [Research](research.html) tab.
